quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I think, therefore I am.
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman
